Flow.description: Sub flow called to Update CC Code and Create CARE Enrolled SAs.

formulas.description: Annual Income to be replaced in long description
formulas.name: fxAnnualIncome

formulas.description: Applicant Name to be replaced in Care application
formulas.name: fxApplicantName

formulas.description: Final trimmed SA IDs to be replaced in Place holder- Removing the final ;
formulas.name: fxFinalSAIDsToBeReplaced

formulas.description: No Of House hold to be replaced in Long description
formulas.name: fxNoOfHousehold

formulas.description: Received Date to be replace in CC Code long description
formulas.name: fxReceivedDate

formulas.description: Updated Long description (with substitute for LANID,Recieved Date)
formulas.name: fxUpdatedCCCodeLongDescription
formulas.expression: SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE({!varLongDescriptionToBeUpdated},"<LAN ID>", {!fxLANID}),"<Date Received>",LPAD(TEXT(MONTH({!fxReceivedDate} )),2,"0")&"/"&LPAD(TEXT(DAY({!fxReceivedDate} )),2,"0")&"/"&TEXT(YEAR({!fxReceivedDate} ))),"<# OF HH>",{!fxNoOfHousehold}),"<$ INCM_AMNT>","$ "&{!fxAnnualIncome}),"<Applicant Name>",{!fxApplicantName}),"<SA ID>",{!fxFinalSAIDsToBeReplaced})

Flow.label: CARE Update CC Code Flow

loops.description: Loop through discounted SA and add it to record collection variable to create care app enrolled records.
loops.name: Loop_Discounted_SA
loops.label: Loop Discounted SA

loops.description: Loop through Other Discounted premise SA (Received from main flow).No need to explicitly check whether this SA has discount.Its already verified in main flow.
loops.name: Loop_Discounted_SA_2
loops.label: Loop Discounted SA Of Other Premise

loops.description: Loop Through existing enrolled SAs and add it to Newly Enrollling SA Variable. For Adjustment Scenario, Main application will remain as Adjustment Transaction.A new transaction and enrolled SA(without Retro Dates) will be created for Main Transaction.
loops.name: Loop_Existing_Enrolled_SAs
loops.label: Loop Existing Enrolled SAs

loops.description: Loop through all valid SA and assign it to a new record collection with start and end date.
loops.name: Loop_Valid_SA
loops.label: Loop Valid SA

loops.description: Loop through All Valid SA To end Discount (Of Selected Premise)
loops.name: Loop_Valid_SA_2
loops.label: Loop Valid SAs Of Selected Premise

loops.description: Loop through all valid SA to fetch Care discounted SAs
loops.name: Loop_Valid_SA_3
loops.label: Loop Valid SAs To Fetch CARE

recordCreates.name: Create_Care_App_Enrolled_SA_For_Transfer
recordCreates.label: Create Care App Enrolled SA For Transfer

recordCreates.description: Create Enrolled SA For Main Transaction(If adjustment Involved, Original transaction is used as adjustment transaction). Note: A new transaction and enrolled SA will be created to mark as original Discount Transaction.
recordCreates.name: Create_Enrolled_SA_For_Adjustment
recordCreates.label: Create Enrolled SA For Adjustment Main Transaction

recordCreates.description:
If Adjustment is involved on transaction on a discounted enrollment, that transaction's CARE App Enrolled SA retro start date and end date getting updated from UI. So Main Transaction will be used as Adjustment transaction to send the retro start date and end date.
Note: A new transaction (With Retro dates blank in care App enrolled SA) will be created for actual discount transaction.
recordCreates.name: Create_New_Transaction
recordCreates.label: Create New Transaction

recordCreates.description: Create Transaction To Drop Discount on Other Premise

recordCreates.label: Create Transaction To Drop Discount on Other Premise

recordCreates.label: Create Transaction To End Existing CARE Discount
